resources.string: Welcome, dear developer. In this sample, you will see how I can map my environment to know where I am. And then, I will be able to relocalize myself.
We can create a new map and we will be able to use it later.
Do you want to create a new map or to use a saved map?
I will now map my environment. Please be sure to be at least at 3 meters from me while I scan the place.
I will now save the map.

Perfect! I\'ve created a map. But we are not done! Because this is a sample, you need now to ask me to localize myself. Let\'s go back to the main menu and continue the procedure with the localization.
I can localize myself and go to my initial position later.
Based on the map you already saved, do you want me to localize myself or to go to my initial position?
Please be sure to be at least at 3 meters from me while I check if I\'m at the right place.
OK, I know where I am.
First move me, then press Go.
First, obviously, you need to move me so I can go back to my initial position. When you have moved me, press Go.
Oops, something went wrong. Please check there is nothing on my way avoiding me to go back to my initial position. Then try again.
Awesome! I\'m back to my initial position!
Make sure my back hatch is closed
Please hide from me until I\'m done!
Make sure I am not charging so I can move. Please double check if my back hatch is closed then press start.
Oops, something went wrong. Please check if there is nothing around me avoiding me to turn and scan, then try again.
